attributes.name: 3D glasses fit design
attributes.description: Indicates how the glasses are worn or attached (e.g., clip-on, wrap-around, fit-over)

attributes.name: 3D glasses technology
attributes.description: Specifies the 3D image/synchronization technology the glasses are designed for, determining compatibility with specific displays or projectors

attributes.name: 3D printer case style
attributes.description: Classifies the overall product type so shoppers can differentiate between soft carrying bags, hard-shell cases, stationary enclosures, and simple dust covers

attributes.name: 3D printer cleaning kit components included
attributes.description: Lists the individual tools and consumables provided in the kit so shoppers know exactly what they are purchasing

attributes.name: 3D printing resin type
attributes.description: Specifies the formulation or intended application of the resin, helping shoppers quickly identify whether the resin is standard, engineering-grade, castable, or other specialized types

attributes.name: 80 Plus efficiency rating
attributes.description: Denotes the official 80 Plus energy-efficiency certification level the PSU has achieved

attributes.name: ADC resolution
attributes.description: Specifies the resolution (in bits) of the integrated Analog-to-Digital Converter, defining measurement precision

attributes.name: Accessibility design features
attributes.description: Lists special design elements that assist users with hearing, vision, or dexterity challenges.

attributes.name: Activation method
attributes.description: Describes how the prepaid credit or SIM is activated by the user.

attributes.name: Adapter directionality
attributes.description: Indicates whether the adapter supports signal flow in both directions or only in one specified direction

attributes.name: Adapter operating modes
attributes.description: Specifies whether the adapter functions as a Bluetooth receiver, transmitter, or both

attributes.name: Adaptive sync technology
attributes.description: Specifies the variable refresh-rate (VRR) technology supported by the monitor for tear-free visuals

attributes.name: Adhesive format
attributes.description: Indicates the physical form in which the adhesive is supplied for repair use

attributes.name: Amplifier/Booster suitable location
attributes.description: Specifies best locations for amplifier or signal booster, such as vehicle or large venue

attributes.name: Anamorphic squeeze ratio
attributes.description: Indicates the horizontal compression factor of an anamorphic lens, allowing users to match lenses with their desired desqueeze output.

attributes.name: Answering machine type
attributes.description: Specifies the presence and technology of an integrated answering machine

attributes.name: Antenna RF connector type
attributes.description: Identifies the RF connector used by the antenna

attributes.name: Antenna connector type
attributes.description: Specifies the RF connector used to attach external antennas

attributes.name: Antenna type
attributes.description: Specifies the type of antenna for electronic devices, e.g. omnidirectional, grid

attributes.name: Appliance board function
attributes.description: Specifies the functional role of the board within the appliance

attributes.name: Appliance unit location
attributes.description: Indicates the physical section of the appliance for which the board is intended (e.g., indoor or outdoor unit)

attributes.name: Audio D/A converter (DAC)
attributes.description: Specifies the type of digital to analog (DAC) converter in audio devices, e.g. USB, optical

attributes.name: Audio bypass type
attributes.description: Specifies how the audio signal is routed when the effect is disengaged (e.g., true bypass, buffered, relay)

attributes.name: Audio cassette tape type
attributes.description: Specifies the IEC tape formulation (bias) for audio cassettes

attributes.name: Audio component form factor
attributes.description: Defines the physical style or installation format of the component

attributes.name: Audio connectivity
attributes.description: Defines the types of audio connection a product supports, such as HDMI or USB

attributes.name: Audio conversion direction
attributes.description: Specifies the signal flow the converter supports (e.g., Analog-to-Digital, Digital-to-Analog, Bidirectional)

attributes.name: Audio duplex capability
attributes.description: Specifies whether the device supports full-duplex (simultaneous two-way) or half-duplex audio communication

attributes.name: Audio mixer type
attributes.description: Identifies the type of audio mixer, such as analog or streaming

attributes.name: Audio output channel
attributes.description: Indicates the number of channels or speaker configuration that a sound system can output to, such as 2 or 5.1

attributes.name: Audio output format
attributes.description: Defines the sound quality and type produced by the audio device, such as digital or analog

attributes.name: Audio purpose
attributes.description: Specifies the intended use or location for audio products, such as car audio or home cinema

attributes.name: Audio return channel support
attributes.description: States whether the device supports ARC or eARC pass-through for routing audio from a display back to an AVR or soundbar

attributes.name: Audio signal configuration
attributes.description: Specifies whether the cable carries mono, stereo, balanced, or multichannel (e.g., TRRS, digital) audio

attributes.name: Audio system
attributes.description: Defines the audio playback/recording system the VCR supports (e.g., Hi-Fi stereo, mono)

attributes.name: Audio technology
attributes.description: Specifies the technology used in audio devices, such as AAC or Dolby atmos

attributes.name: Audio/Scan converter features
attributes.description: Describes the capabilities of an audio/scan converter, such as automatic conversion or remote control

attributes.name: Audio/Video cable connector type (end A)
attributes.description: Specifies the exact connector or interface present on the first end (End A) of the cable

attributes.name: Audio/Video cable connector type (end B)
attributes.description: Specifies the exact connector or interface present on the second end (End B) of the cable

attributes.name: BIOS type
attributes.description: Specifies the type of BIOS used in motherboards, e.g. hybrid, legacy

attributes.name: Backboard material
attributes.description: Specifies the construction material of the game's backboard, affecting rebound performance, durability, and cost

attributes.name: Backlighting type
attributes.description: Describes the lighting style provided on any included keyboard or mouse

attributes.name: Barcode scanner form factor
attributes.description: Specifies the physical design style of the barcode scanner (e.g., handheld, presentation, ring)

attributes.name: Barcode scanner interface
attributes.description: Defines the communication method for barcode scanners, such as USB or Bluetooth

attributes.name: Barcode supported
attributes.description: Specifies the types of barcodes a scanner can read, e.g. 1D, 2D

attributes.name: Base type
attributes.description: Defines the type of base, usually for microphones; e.g. clamp, tripod

attributes.name: Battery cell type
attributes.description: Specifies the chemical composition of a battery, such as alkaline or lithium-air

attributes.name: Battery charge controller type
attributes.description: Specifies the underlying regulation or charging technology or topology the controller uses

attributes.name: Battery connector type
attributes.description: Identifies the primary connector or terminal style used to charge or discharge the battery

attributes.name: Battery mounting type
attributes.description: Identifies the physical mounting or connection standard of the battery pack

attributes.name: Battery terminal type
attributes.description: Specifies the physical connector style on the battery terminals

attributes.name: Bed leveling type
attributes.description: Specifies the method the printer uses to level its build surface before printing

attributes.name: Biometric authentication method
attributes.description: Lists the built-in biometric security options available on the phone, such as fingerprint sensor or face recognition.

attributes.name: Biometric certifications
attributes.description: Lists formal industry or government biometric certifications the device meets (e.g., FBI PIV, FIPS 201)

attributes.name: Blocked signal types
attributes.description: Specifies categories of wireless signals the jammer can block

attributes.name: Bluetooth functionality
attributes.description: Indicates whether the device acts as a transmitter, a receiver, or both (transceiver)

attributes.name: Boombox lighting effects
attributes.description: Describes the presence and style of built-in LED or RGB light shows integrated into the speaker

attributes.name: Bracket profile
attributes.description: Indicates the physical bracket style supplied with the card, determining chassis compatibility

attributes.name: Breadboard type
attributes.description: Classifies the breadboard by fundamental build or size style

attributes.name: Bridge/Router advanced features
attributes.description: Highlights advanced functionalities of bridges/routers, like AI-powered or VPN support

attributes.name: Broadcast video standard
attributes.description: Indicates the analog broadcast standard(s) the VCR is compatible with

attributes.name: Broadcasting standard supported
attributes.description: Specifies the television broadcast or modulation standards (satellite, cable, terrestrial) that the product can decode or handle

attributes.name: Bullhorn features
attributes.description: Highlights the unique functionalities of a bullhorn, like voice recording or siren function

attributes.name: Bungee arm mechanism
attributes.description: Defines the technology used to suspend and guide the mouse cable (e.g., spring arm, elastic cord, magnetic suspension)

attributes.name: Button surface profile
attributes.description: Describes the physical contour of the button's plunger surface, affecting ergonomics and visual style

attributes.name: Cabinet type
attributes.description: Specifies the design and form factor of arcade games, such as bartop or mini arcade

attributes.name: Cable form factor
attributes.description: Describes the physical design style or shape of the cable

attributes.name: Cable jacket rating
attributes.description: Specifies the environmental or safety rating of the cable's outer jacket (e.g., plenum, direct burial, UV-resistant)

attributes.name: Cable shielding
attributes.description: Specifies the type of protection used in cables, e.g. braided (STP), foil (FTP)

attributes.name: Cable style
attributes.description: Describes the physical design of the cable (e.g., braided, flat, coiled, retractable)

attributes.name: Cable tie type
attributes.description: Specifies the construction style or fastening mechanism of the cable tie

attributes.name: Cable tray style
attributes.description: Describes the structural style of the cable tray section that determines ventilation and cable support method

attributes.name: Cache level
attributes.description: Indicates the hierarchy position of the cache (e.g., L1, L2, L3), which affects size, latency, and proximity to the processor cores

attributes.name: Calibration sensor type
attributes.description: Specifies the underlying hardware technology or form factor of the calibrator

attributes.name: Call blocking method
attributes.description: Specifies how the device identifies and blocks unwanted calls

attributes.name: Caller ID compatibility
attributes.description: States whether the phone supports Caller ID services provided by the telephone network

attributes.name: Caller ID standard compatibility
attributes.description: Indicates which caller ID signaling formats the device can decode

attributes.name: Cantilever material
attributes.description: Indicates the material of the cantilever that holds the stylus, impacting tracking ability and sonic signature

attributes.name: Capacitance tolerance
attributes.description: Indicates the permissible deviation of the actual capacitance from the nominal value, expressed as a percentage

attributes.name: Capacitor application
attributes.description: Denotes the primary intended use or application class of the capacitor (e.g., motor run, audio, snubber)

attributes.name: Capacitor polarity
attributes.description: States whether the capacitor is polarized, non-polarized, or bipolar, affecting installation orientation and suitable circuit positions

attributes.name: Card interface type
attributes.description: Describes whether the reader communicates via physical contacts, contactless RF, or both

attributes.name: Card rechargeability
attributes.description: Indicates whether the cards balance can be re-loaded after the initial credit is used, and the primary method of recharging.

attributes.name: Card usage status
attributes.description: Indicates whether the phone card's credit has been used or remains intact

attributes.name: Card/Adapter installation
attributes.description: Identifies how I/O cards or adapters are installed, such as internal or external

attributes.name: Cartridge authenticity
attributes.description: Identifies whether the consumable is original manufacturer, compatible, remanufactured, or refilled

attributes.name: Cartridge mounting style
attributes.description: Specifies how the cartridge attaches to the tonearm or headshell (e.g., half-inch mount, P-mount), ensuring mechanical compatibility

attributes.name: Cartridge type
attributes.description: Identifies the cartridge technology in record players, such as ceramic or magnetic

attributes.name: Cartridge yield type
attributes.description: Indicates the manufacturer-defined capacity class of the cartridge (e.g., standard, high yield)

attributes.name: Case type
attributes.description: Specifies the kind of case for electronics and accessories, such as wallet or book style

attributes.name: Cellular capability
attributes.description: Indicates whether the model supports mobile networks in addition to Wi-Fi

attributes.name: Charger style
attributes.description: Defines the physical form factor or overall design of the wireless charger

attributes.name: Chassis type
attributes.description: Defines the form factor of computer and server cases, such as tower or rack mount

attributes.name: Circuit board features
attributes.description: Describes unique aspects of a circuit board, such as onboard graphics or overclocking support

attributes.name: Cleaning kit components included
attributes.description: Lists the specific items contained in the kit so customers understand what tools and consumables are provided

attributes.name: Clock and alarm features
attributes.description: Details the built-in clock and wake/sleep capabilities the radio offers

attributes.name: Coaxial cable series
attributes.description: Identifies the industry-standard series or designation of the cable (e.g., RG-6, RG-58, LMR-400), which dictates physical dimensions and electrical performance

attributes.name: Color accuracy standards
attributes.description: Defines the color calibration standards, typically for monitors; e.g. sRGB, Adobe RGB

attributes.name: Color depth
attributes.description: Indicates the scanner's optical/output bit depth (number of bits per pixel), which determines color accuracy, gradation, and editing latitude

attributes.name: Communication device features
attributes.description: Identifies unique features in communication devices, such as touchscreen or voice control

attributes.name: Compatible HDCP
attributes.description: Specifies HDCP compatibility of electronic devices, such as HDCP 2.2 or not compatible

attributes.name: Compatible cable tie material
attributes.description: Identifies the type of cable tie (e.g., stainless steel, nylon) the gun is designed to install or remove

attributes.name: Compatible electronic card type
attributes.description: Specifies the types of electronic cards the product can interact with, such as magnetic stripe or library

attributes.name: Compatible equipment type
attributes.description: Specifies the category of pool or spa equipment the circuit board is designed for (e.g., heater, pump, chlorinator)

attributes.name: Compatible exercise machine type
attributes.description: Identifies the type of exercise machine the board is intended for (e.g., treadmill, elliptical)

attributes.name: Compatible filament
attributes.description: Specifies the types of filament a 3D printer can use, like Polylactic acid (PLA) or nylon

attributes.name: Compatible game format
attributes.description: Specifies the type of game format supported, such as digital download only or physical disc

attributes.name: Compatible microphone thread
attributes.description: Specifies the compatible thread size for microphone products, e.g. 5/8"-27

attributes.name: Compatible motherboard form factor
attributes.description: Specifies the motherboard sizes the product can support, such as ATX

attributes.name: Compatible pinball machine edition
attributes.description: Specifies which edition or trim level of the pinball machine the accessory fits (e.g., Pro, Premium, LE)

attributes.name: Compatible power supply form factor
attributes.description: Specifies the power supply unit (PSU) size or standard that the enclosure is designed to house

attributes.name: Compatible processor series
attributes.description: Specifies the processor series that the product is compatible with, such as AMD Ryzen or Intel core solo

attributes.name: Compatible resin type
attributes.description: Specifies the categories of UV resin an SLA/MSLA printer can use

attributes.name: Compatible resolution
attributes.description: Defines the display resolution supported, e.g. 1080p, full HD

attributes.name: Compatible satellite radio service
attributes.description: Identifies the satellite radio service(s) the receiver is designed to work with, ensuring compatibility with existing or intended subscriptions

attributes.name: Compatible voice assistant
attributes.description: Identifies voice control platforms that can operate the receiver

attributes.name: Component mounting style
attributes.description: Defines the primary method by which an electronic component or board is attached to a circuit board, panel, chassis, or rail

attributes.name: Component output type
attributes.description: Specifies the output signal type of electronic components, such as UART or analog

attributes.name: Component package type
attributes.description: Defines the form factor or packaging of electronic components, e.g. SDM (Surface Mount Device), DIP (Dual In-line Package)

attributes.name: Component size code
attributes.description: Specifies the standardized SMD or through-hole size designation (e.g., 0603, 0805) used for the capacitor package

attributes.name: Component tolerance
attributes.description: Defines the permissible deviation from the nominal value (resistance, capacitance, inductance, frequency, etc.) expressed as a percentage

attributes.name: Components included
attributes.description: Lists the hardware parts supplied in the starter kit

attributes.name: Compression circuit type
attributes.description: Describes the underlying gain-reduction technology (e.g., VCA, FET, optical) that shapes the processor's sound and response

attributes.name: Compression format
attributes.description: Defines the type of video file compression used, e.g. MPEG-4, AVI

attributes.name: Computer accessories included
attributes.description: Identifies the supplementary computer accessories provided, such as mouse or laptop bag

attributes.name: Computer form
attributes.description: Defines the physical design or layout of a computer, such as all-in-one or notebook

attributes.name: Computer server features
attributes.description: Describes special features of a server, such as redundant power supply or virtualization support

attributes.name: Computer specialized features
attributes.description: Highlights specific computer features, like liquid cooling system or RGB lighting

attributes.name: Conductor core type
attributes.description: Indicates whether the internal conductor is stranded or solid core

attributes.name: Connection type
attributes.description: Specifies the type of connection used by electronics, such as wired or Bluetooth

attributes.name: Connectivity type
attributes.description: Clarifies whether the board is solderless (breadboard style) or designed for soldering

attributes.name: Connector 1 type
attributes.description: Specifies the connector or interface present on the first end of the adapter or coupler

attributes.name: Connector 2 type
attributes.description: Specifies the connector or interface present on the second end of the adapter or coupler

attributes.name: Connector contact plating
attributes.description: Specifies the surface plating or coating applied to the electrical contacts to improve conductivity and corrosion resistance

attributes.name: Connector mounting style
attributes.description: Indicates how the connector is mechanically mounted or integrated in an assembly (e.g., PCB, panel, chassis, cable, coupler)

attributes.name: Connector orientation
attributes.description: Describes the physical orientation of the mating interface relative to the mounting surface or cable (e.g., straight, right-angle, vertical)

attributes.name: Connector position
attributes.description: Describes the location of the video connector when the screen is viewed from the front (e.g., bottom-right, top-left)

attributes.name: Console accessories included
attributes.description: Lists the key accessories or components packaged with the console (e.g., controllers, cables, dock, games)

attributes.name: Console system
attributes.description: Defines the specific brand of a video game console, such as Atari 2600 or Playstation

attributes.name: Console type
attributes.description: Classifies the console's physical form factor and intended use environment

attributes.name: Contact material
attributes.description: Identifies the metal or plating used for the battery contacts within the holder

attributes.name: Contrast ratio (typical)
attributes.description: Indicates the display's contrast ratio, e.g. 3000:1

attributes.name: Control interface
attributes.description: Identifies how the unit can be configured or controlled (e.g., PC software, mobile app, on-device LCD, remote control)

attributes.name: Conversion direction
attributes.description: Describes the type and direction of conversion the device performs

attributes.name: Cooling technology
attributes.description: Specifies the method used to cool electronics, such as air or heat sink

attributes.name: Cordless phone frequency band
attributes.description: Specifies the radio frequency band(s) the cordless phone system operates on, helping shoppers ensure regional compatibility and avoid interference.

attributes.name: Cosmetic condition
attributes.description: Defines the wear and condition of electronics, e.g. new, opened-never used

attributes.name: DIN size
attributes.description: Specifies the standardized dash opening size the receiver fits into (e.g., Single DIN, Double DIN)

attributes.name: DJ equipment features
attributes.description: Specifies the unique features of DJ gear, such as MIDI control or standalone operation

attributes.name: DJ software compatibility
attributes.description: Identifies the DJ software that the product is compatible with, e.g. Rekordbox, Serato DJ

attributes.name: DOCSIS standard
attributes.description: Specifies the DOCSIS version supported by cable modems

attributes.name: DSL standard compatibility
attributes.description: Identifies which DSL standards a filter or accessory supports to ensure proper noise suppression and connection quality.

attributes.name: DVI connection type
attributes.description: Identifies the specific DVI connector and link format supported (e.g., DVI-D single-link, DVI-I dual-link, Mini-DVI)

attributes.name: Daisy-chain capability
attributes.description: Indicates whether multiple conference units can be linked together (daisy-chained) to expand microphone and speaker coverage, and the connection method used

attributes.name: Data network
attributes.description: Specifies the data network compatibility of mobile devices, like LTE or 3G

attributes.name: Data rollover policy
attributes.description: Indicates whether unused high-speed data carries over to the next validity period or expires.

attributes.name: Decoder/Encoder function
attributes.description: Specifies the logical function implemented by the IC

attributes.name: Device interface
attributes.description: Specifies the method of connection between electronic devices, e.g. HDMI, USB

attributes.name: Dialing method
attributes.description: Defines the mechanism the phone uses to enter numbers.

attributes.name: Dielectric type
attributes.description: Specifies the dielectric or insulating material used in capacitors, such as ceramic or electrolytic

attributes.name: Digital sound processing
attributes.description: Specifies the sound modification techniques in audio components, such as delay or reverb

attributes.name: Digitizer surface finish
attributes.description: Describes the surface coating or finish of the digitizer glass

attributes.name: Direct box type
attributes.description: Specifies the circuit configuration of the direct box (DI), which affects power requirements, sound character, and intended application

attributes.name: Direction detection capability
attributes.description: States whether the radar can report object direction (e.g., approaching, departing, or both)

attributes.name: Display interface
attributes.description: Specifies the video or data interface used by the screen module

attributes.name: Docking compatibility
attributes.description: Indicates whether the console can be docked or charged without removing the case

attributes.name: Downstream port types
attributes.description: Lists the kinds of output ports the hub offers for connecting peripherals (e.g., USB-A, USB-C, HDMI, Ethernet)

attributes.name: Drive form factor
attributes.description: Specifies the height or size class of the drive mechanism (e.g., full-height, half-height, slimline)

attributes.name: Driver configuration
attributes.description: Specifies the number of discrete driver ways in the speaker system (e.g., 2-way, 3-way)

attributes.name: Driver technology
attributes.description: Specifies the transducer type used to produce sound (e.g., dynamic, balanced armature, planar magnetic, hybrid)

attributes.name: Drone board function
attributes.description: Describes the primary purpose of the circuit board within the drone system

attributes.name: Duplex component type
attributes.description: Defines the specific form of duplex part supplied (e.g., assembly, tray, gear)

attributes.name: Duplexer installation type
attributes.description: Clarifies how the duplexer attaches to the printer (e.g., internal slot, rear external attachment)

attributes.name: Duplexing technology
attributes.description: Specifies if a printer supports double-sided printing, e.g not supported, automatic duplexing

attributes.name: Duplication operation mode
attributes.description: Indicates whether the duplicator functions independently, requires connection to a computer, or supports both modes

attributes.name: Dynamics processing function
attributes.description: Identifies the primary dynamics tasks the unit performs (e.g., compressor, limiter, noise gate, de-esser)

attributes.name: E-Book reader part location
attributes.description: Specifies where on the device the part is installed or located

attributes.name: E-book formats supported
attributes.description: Identifies the range of e-book formats compatible with the device, such as PDF or EPUB

attributes.name: E-reader display technology
attributes.description: Identifies the type of screen technology used in e-readers, such as LCD or e-ink

attributes.name: Ear orientation
attributes.description: Specifies whether the earpiece is designed for the left ear, right ear, or can be worn on either

attributes.name: Ear tip size
attributes.description: Provides the generic size label commonly used for in-ear tips when exact millimeter sizes are not supplied

attributes.name: Ear tip style
attributes.description: Defines the geometric shape of the ear tip that influences fit and acoustic seal

attributes.name: Earphone features
attributes.description: Highlights unique features in earphones, such as built-in microphone or volume control

attributes.name: Effects processor form factor
attributes.description: Describes the physical or delivery format of the processor

attributes.name: Enclosure type
attributes.description: Specifies the type of casing or cover for 3D printers, such as open frame or DIY enclosure

attributes.name: Energy efficiency class (HDR)
attributes.description: Specifies the energy efficiency of HDR-enabled devices, typically televisions; e.g. A+++

attributes.name: Energy efficiency class (SDR)
attributes.description: Specifies the energy efficiency of SDR-enabled devices, typically televisions; e.g. A+++

attributes.name: Entry orientation
attributes.description: Describes the direction coins are inserted into the mechanism (e.g., front, top, side, bottom)

attributes.name: Equalizer type
attributes.description: Classifies the equalization topology or processing style provided by the unit

attributes.name: Error correction type
attributes.description: Indicates whether the memory module includes error-correcting capability and, if so, the specific ECC technology or buffering style used

attributes.name: Ethernet LAN interface type
attributes.description: Specifies the type of Ethernet connection a product supports, such as LAN or fast

attributes.name: Ethernet cable category
attributes.description: Indicates the TIA/EIA category rating of twisted-pair Ethernet cables, defining bandwidth and performance

attributes.name: Exercise machine board function
attributes.description: Describes the primary function or location of the board within the machine (e.g., motor control, display)

attributes.name: Expansion slots
attributes.description: Specifies slots for adding hardware in computers or servers, e.g. PCIe, M.2

attributes.name: External antenna connector type
attributes.description: Defines the physical connector used to attach external antennas

attributes.name: FM Transmitter playback source
attributes.description: Identifies the media input options the device can play from, beyond Bluetooth (e.g., USB stick, microSD card)

attributes.name: Fader type
attributes.description: Identifies the physical style of channel faders on the mixer

attributes.name: Filter form factor
attributes.description: Describes the physical style of the filter unit for compatibility checks (e.g., cartridge, fan filter, capsule, disc, filter set)

attributes.name: Filter installation type
attributes.description: Specifies the physical style and installation method of the DSL filter

attributes.name: Filter slope
attributes.description: Specifies the attenuation rate of the crossover's filters, expressed in dB per octave

attributes.name: Filter topology
attributes.description: Specifies the filter's response family, which determines frequency-response shape and phase characteristics

attributes.name: Filtering modes
attributes.description: Defines the operational modes of radar or speed detectors, e.g. highway mode, GPS lockouts

attributes.name: Filtration technology
attributes.description: Identifies the technology or stage used by the filter to remove airborne contaminants produced during printing

attributes.name: Fingerprint capture method
attributes.description: Defines the type of fingerprint detection method used, such as capacitive or optical

attributes.name: FireWire standard
attributes.description: Identifies the IEEE 1394 specification the cable supports, which determines maximum speed and device compatibility

attributes.name: Flammability rating (UL 94)
attributes.description: States the UL 94 flame-retardant classification of the sleeve material

attributes.name: Flash cell type
attributes.description: Identifies the number of bits stored per flash cell within the memory architecture (e.g., SLC, MLC, TLC)

attributes.name: Force feedback type
attributes.description: Describes the drive mechanism used to generate force feedback and steering resistance

attributes.name: Frequency/Radio bands supported
attributes.description: Indicates the radio bands a device is compatible with, e.g. AM, UHF

attributes.name: GPS device features
attributes.description: Describes special capabilities of a GPS device, like AI-powered or built-in dash cam

attributes.name: Game console skin coverage
attributes.description: Indicates which parts of the device the skin set covers

attributes.name: Gaming enhancement features
attributes.description: Indicates HDMI 2.1 gaming-oriented technologies supported by the receiver

attributes.name: Gimbal stabilization axes
attributes.description: Identifies the number of axes of electronic or mechanical stabilization provided when the selfie stick includes a gimbal function.

attributes.name: Glide style
attributes.description: Indicates the intended glide characteristic of the skates (e.g., speed, control)

attributes.name: Graphics card type
attributes.description: Specifies the type of graphics card in a computer, e.g. professional, dedicated

attributes.name: Graphics tablet accessories included
attributes.description: Identifies the additional items included with a graphics tablet, like pen stand or pen tether

attributes.name: Graphics tablet specialized features
attributes.description: Details special features of a graphics tablet, such as waterproof or LED backlight

attributes.name: Grip or holder style
attributes.description: Identifies the primary physical form of the product, helping customers quickly filter for their preferred design

attributes.name: HDMI version supported
attributes.description: Specifies the highest HDMI specification version the device fully supports (e.g., HDMI 2.1 for 4K @ 120 Hz)

attributes.name: HDR format
attributes.description: Specifies the High Dynamic Range (HDR) for televisions, e.g. HDR10, Dolby Vision

attributes.name: Handset type
attributes.description: Defines handset for telephones, such as corded or cordless

attributes.name: Haptic feedback type
attributes.description: Describes the kind of tactile or motion feedback the controller provides

attributes.name: Hard drive features
attributes.description: Identifies special capabilities of a hard drive, such as AI-powered or shockproof

attributes.name: Hard drive form factor
attributes.description: Specifies the physical size of a hard drive, e.g.  2.5 inch, 3.5 inch

attributes.name: Hard drive installation
attributes.description: Identifies the placement of a hard drive in electronics, like internal or external

attributes.name: Hardness rating (pencil scale)
attributes.description: Specifies the tempered-glass hardness rating based on the pencil hardness scale.

attributes.name: Headphone cushion shape
attributes.description: Describes the physical contour of the cushion to help customers match ear-cup geometry

attributes.name: Headphone driver technology
attributes.description: Defines the transducer type used to create sound in the headphones

attributes.name: Headphone jack type
attributes.description: Specifies the type of headphone jack size, such as 3.5 mm, USB type-C

attributes.name: Headphone style
attributes.description: Defines the design headphones, e.g. behind-the-neck, earbuds

attributes.name: Headset connection type
attributes.description: Specifies the interface(s) available for connecting external headsets to the phone.

attributes.name: Hearing aid compatibility
attributes.description: Specifies whether the phone meets hearing-aid compatibility (HAC) requirements and, if applicable, the rating level

attributes.name: Hole plating type
attributes.description: Indicates whether the board's holes are non-plated, plated-through, or feature via barrels, which impacts soldering and inter-layer connectivity

attributes.name: Host interface
attributes.description: Specifies the method used to connect to hard drives, such as Thunderbolt 3 or SATA

attributes.name: Hub/Switch storage options
attributes.description: Identifies the storage capabilities of hubs or switches, like stackable or non-stackable

attributes.name: Identity verification requirement
attributes.description: Specifies if real-name registration or eKYC identity verification is required before the SIM or eSIM can be used

attributes.name: Inductance tolerance
attributes.description: Defines the allowable percentage deviation from the nominal inductance value

attributes.name: Input connection type
attributes.description: Specifies the connector or interface standard accepted on the converter's input side

attributes.name: Input signal interface
attributes.description: Specifies the type(s) of input connection(s) the audio converter accepts

attributes.name: Input video interface
attributes.description: Specifies the type(s) of video connector accepted as input by the scan converter

attributes.name: Installation accessories included
attributes.description: Identifies any tools or instructional materials bundled with the battery to aid installation

attributes.name: Installation tools included
attributes.description: Lists any tools or consumables bundled with the part to aid installation

attributes.name: Instruction set architecture
attributes.description: Defines the computer architecture a processor can understand, e.g. 32-bit

attributes.name: Instrument controller type
attributes.description: Identifies the musical instrument simulated by a game controller, such as guitar or microphone

attributes.name: Integrated LED lighting
attributes.description: Indicates whether the speaker incorporates built-in LED or RGB lighting and its type

attributes.name: Integrated power/charging options
attributes.description: Specifies whether the stand includes built-in electrical outlets and/or USB charging ports, enhancing utility for connected devices

attributes.name: Integrated stand type
attributes.description: Describes the style of built-in stand or support mechanism on the case.

attributes.name: Intercom communication type
attributes.description: Classifies the fundamental communication format the unit supports

attributes.name: Intercom wiring type
attributes.description: Specifies the wiring or communication scheme an intercom speaker unit is designed for

attributes.name: Internal drive form factor supported
attributes.description: Indicates the compatible hard drive sizes for a device, e.g. 2.5-inch

attributes.name: Internet radio form factor
attributes.description: Defines the physical style or mounting orientation of the internet radio

attributes.name: Joystick mounting style
attributes.description: Indicates how the joystick assembly is secured to a control panel or cabinet

attributes.name: Joystick sensor technology
attributes.description: Identifies the primary sensing technology used to detect movement or position

attributes.name: Karaoke modes
attributes.description: Specifies the type of karaoke performance, such as single or duet

attributes.name: Keyboard assembly type
attributes.description: Defines the physical assembly supplied (e.g., standalone keyboard, palmrest with keyboard, individual key set)

values.name: Palmrest with keyboard touchpad and logic board

attributes.name: Keyboard backlight type
attributes.description: Details the illumination technology or style used for the keyboard keys or case

attributes.name: Keyboard format
attributes.description: Defines the size and layout of a keyboard, such as full-size or compact

attributes.name: Keyboard mounting style
attributes.description: Defines the internal plate mounting method that affects sound and feel of mechanical keyboards

attributes.name: Keyboard port type
attributes.description: Specifies the type of port for keyboard connectivity, such as USB type-C

attributes.name: Keyboard specialized features
attributes.description: Identifies unique characteristics of a keyboard, like adjustable angle or backlighting

attributes.name: Keyboard switch type
attributes.description: Specifies the keyboard's feedback style, such as tactile or clicky

attributes.name: Keyboard type
attributes.description: Specifies the design and functionality of a keyboard, e.g. standard, backlit

attributes.name: Keycap legend printing method
attributes.description: Describes how legends are applied to the keycaps, impacting longevity and appearance

attributes.name: Keycap material
attributes.description: Indicates the primary material or manufacturing process of the keycaps which impacts durability, texture, and legends

attributes.name: Keycap profile
attributes.description: Specifies the sculpt or shape family of the keycap set, affecting typing feel and aesthetics

attributes.name: Keystone correction type
attributes.description: Describes the type of keystone or geometric correction the projector supports to eliminate trapezoidal distortion (e.g., manual vertical, automatic four-point)

attributes.name: LNB output
attributes.description: Specifies the number of satellite receiver connections, such as single or quad

attributes.name: LNB technology
attributes.description: Classifies the type of technology in satellite LNBs, such as universal or low noise

attributes.name: Lamp assembly type
attributes.description: Specifies whether the product is a bare bulb, a lamp with housing, a twin pack, or another assembly configuration

attributes.name: Lamp quality grade
attributes.description: Indicates whether the lamp is original OEM, uses an OEM bulb in compatible housing, or is fully aftermarket/compatible

attributes.name: Laptop cable type
attributes.description: Identifies the functional purpose of the cable within the laptop

attributes.name: Laptop housing part type
attributes.description: Specifies which exterior component is provided (e.g., bottom base, palmrest, bezel)

attributes.name: Legend type
attributes.description: Indicates whether the marker is blank or pre-printed with numbers, letters, symbols, or other markings

attributes.name: Lens characteristic
attributes.description: Lists special functional characteristics applied to the lenses (e.g., blue-light blocking, UV400)

attributes.name: Lens color combination
attributes.description: Specifies the lens color pairing used for anaglyph 3D glasses

attributes.name: Lens kit accessories included
attributes.description: Lists the supplementary items provided with the phone lens or filter kit so shoppers know exactly what theyre getting and can compare bundles.

attributes.name: Lens protector coverage style
attributes.description: Defines the physical form factor or coverage design of a mobile phone camera lens protector.

attributes.name: Lens protector features
attributes.description: Lists special functional features offered by the protector.

attributes.name: Light rejection type
attributes.description: Indicates whether and how the screen rejects ambient or ceiling light, improving image contrast in bright environments

attributes.name: Lighting type
attributes.description: Describes any built-in lighting features of the headset

attributes.name: Logic family
attributes.description: Identifies the semiconductor logic family or technology of the IC

attributes.name: M.2 drive length supported
attributes.description: Specifies which M.2 card lengths the enclosure or adapter can accept

attributes.name: MIMO technology
attributes.description: Indicates the Multiple-Input Multiple-Output wireless technology supported by the router

attributes.name: MP3 player accessories included
attributes.description: Identifies the extra accessories packaged with an MP3 player, such as case or car charger

attributes.name: MagSafe compatibility
attributes.description: Indicates whether the accessory supports Apples MagSafe magnetic attachment or charging ecosystem.

attributes.name: Management type
attributes.description: Describes the manageability level of the device (e.g., fully managed, smart managed, unmanaged), so shoppers can match product capabilities with network requirements

attributes.name: Map update policy
attributes.description: States how map updates are provided or priced for the device

attributes.name: Marine navigator features
attributes.description: Specifies the capabilities of marine navigation tools, such as touchscreen or waterproof

attributes.name: Marker format
attributes.description: Defines the physical style or construction of the marker

attributes.name: Marker text color
attributes.description: Specifies the color of the printed legend or text on the marker's surface (distinct from the marker body color)

attributes.name: Marquee substrate
attributes.description: Specifies the physical medium the artwork is printed on or supplied with (e.g., translite film, reverse-printed acrylic, vinyl decal)

attributes.name: Maximum bit depth
attributes.description: Defines the highest digital word length (in bits) that the converter supports, affecting dynamic range and resolution

attributes.name: Maximum reel diameter supported
attributes.description: Specifies the largest reel diameter the deck can accommodate

attributes.name: Measured parameters
attributes.description: Lists the electrical or battery metrics the device can measure or display

attributes.name: Media format
attributes.description: Defines the compatible media formats for a device, such as vinyl or VHS

attributes.name: Media physical size
attributes.description: Specifies the standardized physical size or form factor of the blank media

attributes.name: Media player form factor
attributes.description: Describes the physical style of the device, helping shoppers choose between compact sticks and larger set-top boxes

attributes.name: Memory channels
attributes.description: Defines the data transmission capacity of computer processors, such as dual or quad

attributes.name: Memory form factor
attributes.description: Specifies the physical layout of memory modules, such as DIMM or micro-DIMM

attributes.name: Memory rank
attributes.description: Indicates the rank layout of the module (how chips are organized), affecting compatibility and performance tuning

attributes.name: Memory technology
attributes.description: Specifies the type of memory used in electronic devices, such as DDR or SDRAM

attributes.name: Mesh networking technology
attributes.description: Specifies whether the access point supports mesh capability and the standard or protocol used

attributes.name: Microphone design
attributes.description: Defines the design category for microphones, e.g. condenser, dynamic

attributes.name: Microphone preamp form factor
attributes.description: Identifies the physical style or enclosure format of the microphone preamp for installation or use

attributes.name: Microphone thread
attributes.description: Specifies the thread size for microphones, e.g. 1/4"-20, M6

attributes.name: Microphone type
attributes.description: Defines the microphone technology used, such as condenser or dynamic

attributes.name: Microphone windshield type
attributes.description: Specifies the construction style of the windshield (e.g., foam slip-on, furry deadcat, blimp, basket), so users can quickly select the appropriate wind-noise solution

attributes.name: Mixer type
attributes.description: Classifies DJ mixers based on their design, such as digital or scratch

attributes.name: Mobile phone accessories included
attributes.description: Lists the supplementary items provided in the mobile phone accessory set so shoppers know exactly what components are included

attributes.name: Mobile phone case features
attributes.description: Describes the unique characteristics of a mobile phone case, such as shockproof or snug fit

attributes.name: Mobile phone connector type
attributes.description: Identifies the interface standard of a replacement charging or data port module.

attributes.name: Mobile phone form factor
attributes.description: Physical design style of the handset.

attributes.name: Mobility type
attributes.description: Indicates the base style that affects mobility, distinguishing between stationary feet, rolling casters, or interchangeable options

attributes.name: Modem form factor
attributes.description: Describes the physical design style of the modem (e.g., USB dongle, desktop unit, M.2 module)

attributes.name: Modem technology
attributes.description: Specifies the primary transmission medium or networking technology the modem uses to access the service provider network (e.g., Cable/DOCSIS, DSL, Cellular)

attributes.name: Modulation method
attributes.description: Specifies the technique used to modify a signal in electronic devices, such as AM or PCM

attributes.name: Monitor shape
attributes.description: Specifies the contour of a monitor's screen, such as flat or curved

attributes.name: Monitor/Screen specialized features
attributes.description: Details specific features of a screen, such as built-in speakers or suitable for gaming

attributes.name: Motherboard chipset family
attributes.description: Specifies the type of chipset in a motherboard, such as Intel or NVIDIA

attributes.name: Motherboard form factor
attributes.description: Specifies the physical dimensions and standards of the motherboard, e.g. ATX, Mini-ITX

attributes.name: Motherboard memory features
attributes.description: Describes the memory characteristics of a motherboard, like ECC or unbuffered

attributes.name: Mount installation point
attributes.description: Indicates where on the vehicle or equipment the mount is installed

attributes.name: Mount interface system
attributes.description: Identifies the proprietary or industry-standard connection platform integrated into the mount (e.g., RAM AMPS pattern, Quad Lock)

attributes.name: Mounting interface pattern
attributes.description: Identifies the mechanical interface or hole pattern used to connect the mount to a radio cradle, bracket, or ball system

attributes.name: Mounting interface standard
attributes.description: Specifies the mounting pattern or interface the holder or cradle supports (e.g., AMPS, VESA 75, RAM B ball)

attributes.name: Mounting mechanism
attributes.description: Defines how the phone or camera attaches to the stick or holder.

attributes.name: Mounting style
attributes.description: Specifies how the push button is secured to a control panel, affecting installation method and panel-thickness compatibility

attributes.name: Mounting technology
attributes.description: Indicates whether the IC is designed for through-hole or surface-mount assembly

attributes.name: Mounting thread size
attributes.description: Indicates the standard tripod or accessory thread size provided on the product (e.g., 1/4"-20)

attributes.name: Mouse pad features
attributes.description: Describes unique characteristics of a mouse pad, such as lighting or stitched edges

attributes.name: Mouse port type
attributes.description: Specifies the connection type for a computer mouse, e.g. wireless UBS, Bluetooth

attributes.name: Mouse technology
attributes.description: Specifies the functionality or design of a computer mouse, such as wireless or gaming

attributes.name: Mouse/Trackball features
attributes.description: Describes special characteristics of mice/trackballs, like ergonomic design or adjustable weight

attributes.name: Multi-GPU technology
attributes.description: Indicates the capability of a motherboard to support multiple GPUs, e.g. not supported, CrossFireX

attributes.name: Multiplexer technology
attributes.description: Specifies the underlying signal or wavelength technology used by the multiplexer (e.g., CWDM, DWDM)

attributes.name: NEMA enclosure rating
attributes.description: Specifies the NEMA type classification that defines protection against environmental hazards (e.g., Type 4X, Type 12)

attributes.name: Native aspect ratio
attributes.description: Specifies the original aspect ratio of a display, typically for projectors; e.g. 16:8

attributes.name: Network cable interface
attributes.description: Specifies the type of connector on a network cable, e.g. BNC, MPO/MTP

attributes.name: Network layer support
attributes.description: Indicates the highest OSI layer switching or routing features provided by the switch

attributes.name: Network protocols supported
attributes.description: Defines the networking standards a device supports, e.g. TCP/IP, DNS

attributes.name: Networking standards
attributes.description: Specifies the protocols a networking device supports, e.g. IEEE 802.3

attributes.name: Neutral density rating
attributes.description: Defines the optical density or strength of an ND filter, expressed by common ND factors or stop reductions

attributes.name: Noise cancellation technology
attributes.description: Specifies the type of noise-reduction system used in the headphones, helping shoppers identify models with active, passive, or adaptive noise control

attributes.name: Noise reduction system
attributes.description: Specifies the built-in analog noise-reduction standard(s) supported by the deck

attributes.name: Nozzle coating
attributes.description: Specifies any surface treatment applied to the nozzle to improve wear resistance or reduce filament adhesion

attributes.name: Nozzle thread type
attributes.description: Defines the mechanical thread or mounting standard used to attach the nozzle (e.g., M6, MK8, E3D V6, Volcano)

attributes.name: Operation mechanism
attributes.description: Describes how the tool applies tension and cuts the tie (e.g., manual, pneumatic, automatic)

attributes.name: Optical disc recordability
attributes.description: Defines whether an optical disc is write-once or rewritable and whether it is single- or double-layer

attributes.name: Optical drive loading mechanism
attributes.description: Indicates how discs are inserted into the drive (e.g., tray-loading, slot-loading, top-loading)

attributes.name: Optical drive type
attributes.description: Identifies the media formats a device's optical drive can read and write, e.g. CD-ROM, DVD-ROM

attributes.name: Outlet type
attributes.description: Specifies the plug type for electronic devices, e.g. type A, type L

attributes.name: Output connection type
attributes.description: Specifies the connector or interface standard provided by the converter on its output side

attributes.name: Output signal interface
attributes.description: Specifies the type(s) of output connection(s) provided by the converter

attributes.name: Output video interface
attributes.description: Specifies the type(s) of video connector provided as output by the scan converter

attributes.name: Output waveform
attributes.description: Specifies the type of signal an electronic oscillator generates, such as sawtooth or sine

attributes.name: Overclock profile support
attributes.description: Identifies standardized overclocking profiles stored in the module (e.g., Intel XMP, AMD EXPO)

attributes.name: PBX system type
attributes.description: Defines the overall architecture of the PBX product

attributes.name: PCB surface finish
attributes.description: Specifies the protective coating applied to exposed copper pads

attributes.name: PCB type
attributes.description: Identifies the type of printed circuit board (PCB), such as rigid or flexible

attributes.name: PCIe lane configuration
attributes.description: Specifies the physical lane width the riser supports (e.g., x1, x4, x8, x16), indicating slot size and electrical bandwidth

attributes.name: PSTN connectivity options
attributes.description: Specifies the Public Switched Telephone Network (PSTN) interfaces a product supports, e.g. FXO, POTS

attributes.name: Pager application
attributes.description: Identifies the primary use case or environment the pager is intended for

attributes.name: Pairing method
attributes.description: Defines how the product connects or links with other devices, e.g. Bluetooth, Wi-Fi

attributes.name: Panel specification
attributes.description: Defines the type of patch panel for cable management, such as fiber optic or Cat6

attributes.name: Panel termination
attributes.description: Defines the termination method for patch panels, e.g. RJ-45 or 110 punch down

attributes.name: Parallel processing technology support
attributes.description: Specifies the parallel processing capabilities of motherboards, e.g. multi-GPU, multi-core

attributes.name: Passband
attributes.description: Specifies the frequency band that an electronic filter allows to pass through, e.g. high-pass

attributes.name: Payment mechanism type
attributes.description: Identifies how players activate the machine (e.g., coin-operated, card swipe)

attributes.name: Phone camera position
attributes.description: Indicates the physical position or function of the camera module within the phone

attributes.name: Phone card delivery format
attributes.description: Indicates whether the prepaid credit is supplied as a physical scratch card or as a digital code/voucher.

attributes.name: Phone skin coverage
attributes.description: Specifies which portions of the phone the skin or wrap is designed to cover

attributes.name: Phone strap accessories included
attributes.description: Lists extra components supplied with the charm or strap set, such as adapter tab, phone case, pouch, or wristlet.

attributes.name: Pinball machine edition
attributes.description: Identifies the specific production or collector edition tier of the pinball machine

attributes.name: Pinball machine format
attributes.description: Specifies the physical or digital format of the product (e.g., mechanical, virtual, tabletop, kit)

attributes.name: Plan service type
attributes.description: Defines whether the SIM plan is data-only or includes voice and/or SMS services.

attributes.name: Playback disc formats
attributes.description: Defines the disc formats compatible with a DVD or Blu-Ray player; e.g CD audio, JPEG

attributes.name: Playback speed supported
attributes.description: Lists the record rotation speeds the turntable or record player can operate at

attributes.name: Player drive type
attributes.description: Specifies the mechanism that spins a record player, such as belt or idler

attributes.name: PoE standard
attributes.description: Identifies the Power over Ethernet (PoE) protocol a product adheres to; e.g. passive, IEEE 802.3af

attributes.name: Pointing device
attributes.description: Defines the device used for navigating on a computer screen, e.g. mouse buttons, touchpad

attributes.name: Polar pattern
attributes.description: Indicates the sound pick-up orientation of a microphone, such as omnidirectional or cardioid

attributes.name: Polarity configuration
attributes.description: Describes the internal polarity arrangement relevant to LEDs, display modules, and similar devices

attributes.name: Polarization
attributes.description: Defines the wave direction of antennae, e.g. vertical, circular

attributes.name: Power connector type
attributes.description: Specifies the auxiliary power connector(s) required or provided by the riser or adapter

attributes.name: Power conversion semiconductor type
attributes.description: Identifies the primary semiconductor material used in the charger's power stage, which influences size, efficiency, and heat generation

attributes.name: Power supply efficiency rating
attributes.description: States the 80 Plus efficiency certification level of the desktop's PSU

attributes.name: Power supply form factor
attributes.description: Specifies the physical size and mounting standard of the PSU (e.g., ATX, SFX)

attributes.name: Power supply modularity
attributes.description: Indicates whether the PSU's cables are non-removable, partially removable, or fully removable

attributes.name: Primary PCIe slot version
attributes.description: Indicates the PCI Express generation supported by the main x16 slot typically used for graphics cards

attributes.name: Print orientation
attributes.description: Identifies which side of the material the graphic is printed on

attributes.name: Print server form factor
attributes.description: Indicates the physical design of the print server (e.g., external box, internal card, USB dongle)

attributes.name: Print technology
attributes.description: Specifies the process used by a printer, such as inkjet or laser

attributes.name: Printer accessories included
attributes.description: Details the supplementary components included with a printer, copier, or fax; e.g. paper tray, fuser

attributes.name: Printer color capability
attributes.description: Specifies whether the device outputs in monochrome only or supports full-color printing and copying

attributes.name: Printer connection interface
attributes.description: Defines the type of port the print server uses to connect to the printer itself

attributes.name: Printer form factor
attributes.description: Classifies the physical style or portability of the device

attributes.name: Printer functions
attributes.description: Defines the capabilities of printers, copiers, and fax machines; e.g. scan, photo print

attributes.name: Printer/Copier specialized features
attributes.description: Highlights specific features of printers/copiers, such as mobile printing support or voice control

attributes.name: Printing color
attributes.description: Defines the color output of toner and inkjet cartridges, e.g. black, cyan

attributes.name: Privacy filtering direction
attributes.description: Indicates from which viewing directions the filter blocks visibility (e.g., two-way horizontal, four-way)

attributes.name: Processor cores
attributes.description: Indicates the number of cores in a computer's processor, e.g. dual

attributes.name: Processor family
attributes.description: Identifies the series or brand of the electronic device's CPU, e.g. Intel Core i7

attributes.name: Processor socket
attributes.description: Specifies compatible processor socket type in electronics, such as LGA 1151 (socket H4) or Socket AM4

attributes.name: Processor technology
attributes.description: Defines processor technology, typically for audio equipment; e.g. software-based, tube/valve

attributes.name: Projector light source
attributes.description: Identifies the type of light source in a projector, such as LED or laser

attributes.name: Protected component
attributes.description: Identifies the part of the pinball machine that the cover protects

attributes.name: Push button terminal type
attributes.description: Specifies the electrical connection style on the button, ensuring compatibility with wiring harnesses and quick-connect tabs during installation

attributes.name: RAID levels supported
attributes.description: Lists all RAID configurations that the hard drive array can create or manage

attributes.name: RF output standard
attributes.description: Specifies the television or radio broadcast standard the modulator outputs

attributes.name: Rack format
attributes.description: Defines the physical housing or size standard of the channel strip for rack or desktop placement

attributes.name: Rack mounting style
attributes.description: Describes the structural style of the rack mount (e.g., fixed shelf, sliding shelf, rails, blank panel)

attributes.name: Rack width standard
attributes.description: Defines the industry standard horizontal mounting width the product follows

attributes.name: Radar bands
attributes.description: Specifies the frequency bands a radar device can detect, e.g. X, K

attributes.name: Radar technology
attributes.description: Specifies the radar technology used in a product, e.g. pulse, solid-state

attributes.name: Radio form factor
attributes.description: Identifies the physical class of the amateur transceiver, influencing mounting options, power requirements, and typical use scenarios

attributes.name: Radio scanner form factor
attributes.description: Indicates the physical configuration or mounting style of the radio scanner (e.g., handheld, base, desktop, vehicle-mounted)

attributes.name: Read/Write speed
attributes.description: Indicates data transfer rate or speed, typically for disk duplicators; e.g. 4x, 52x

attributes.name: Record cleaning components included
attributes.description: Lists the specific items supplied in the kit so customers can compare bundles at a glance (e.g., brush, fluid, cloth)

attributes.name: Recording accessories included
attributes.description: Details the extra components included in recording bundles, such as headphones or microphone

attributes.name: Recording capability type
attributes.description: Indicates whether the receiver can record TV content and the method used (e.g., USB PVR, internal HDD, cloud)

attributes.name: Recording functionality
attributes.description: Indicates whether and how the receiver can record TV content (e.g., DVR to internal HDD, external USB)

attributes.name: Recording mode
attributes.description: Lists the operational modes the recorder supports (e.g., continuous, timed recording)

attributes.name: Recording speed modes supported
attributes.description: Lists the tape speed modes the VCR can record or play, affecting recording time and picture quality

attributes.name: Remote control functions
attributes.description: Lists the specific actions the remote shutter can trigger beyond taking photos.

attributes.name: Remote shutter form factor
attributes.description: Identifies the physical style or housing of the remote shutter, such as keyfob/button, ring controller, or selfie stick with integrated shutter.

attributes.name: Removable storage formats supported
attributes.description: Defines the removable storage formats a device is compatible with, e.g. SD, microUSB

attributes.name: Replacement lamp type
attributes.description: Classifies the style of replacement part provided (e.g., lamp and housing module, LED backlight strip, CCFL assembly)

attributes.name: Resistance tolerance
attributes.description: Defines the permissible deviation of the actual resistance from its nominal value, expressed as a percentage (e.g., 1%)

attributes.name: Restrictor gate shape
attributes.description: Defines the geometric shape of the restrictor gate included with or required by the joystick

attributes.name: Rewinder operation mode
attributes.description: Defines the functional modes the rewinder supports (e.g., rewind-only, rewind and fast-forward)

attributes.name: Rise height class
attributes.description: Categorizes how much additional height the thumb grip adds relative to the stock stick (e.g., low-rise, mid-rise, high-rise)

attributes.name: Room correction technology
attributes.description: Specifies the automatic acoustic calibration or room-correction system integrated in the receiver

attributes.name: Rotator control technology
attributes.description: Defines the control mechanism of antenna rotators, such as manual or motorized

attributes.name: SIM card capability
attributes.description: Indicates the type of SIM card configuration in mobile devices, e.g. dual, embedded

attributes.name: SIM card type
attributes.description: Specifies the size and format of a SIM card, such as eSIM or microSIM

attributes.name: Satellite coverage area
attributes.description: Defines the geographical regions a satellite phone can access, such as Australia or Africa

attributes.name: Satellite messaging capability
attributes.description: Indicates whether the product supports one-way (outgoing only) or two-way (send and receive) satellite messaging

attributes.name: Satellite navigation systems supported
attributes.description: Specifies which global navigation satellite systems (GNSS) the phone can receive for positioning and tracking.

attributes.name: Satellite network type
attributes.description: Identifies the service provider for satellite phones, e.g. Inmarsat, Iridium

attributes.name: Scanner features
attributes.description: Highlights special functions of a scanner, such as AI-powered or scan to cloud

attributes.name: Scanner grip compatibility
attributes.description: Indicates whether the case fits scanners with a pistol/trigger handle, standard handheld form, or both

attributes.name: Scanner maintenance kit type
attributes.description: Classifies the nature of the product so shoppers can quickly distinguish between cleaning cards, complete kits, calibration kits, roller sets, wipes, and solutions

attributes.name: Scanner sensor type
attributes.description: Specifies the type of sensor in scanners, such as 2D imager or laser

attributes.name: Screen assembly components included
attributes.description: Clarifies which parts come pre-assembled with the screen

attributes.name: Screen curvature rating
attributes.description: Specifies the curvature radius of curved monitors (e.g., 1000R), indicating how pronounced the curve is

attributes.name: Screen operation type
attributes.description: Describes the screen's structural or deployment style (e.g., fixed frame, manual pull-down, motorized, tripod, inflatable)

attributes.name: Screen protection features
attributes.description: Details how the case protects the phone screen beyond basic coverage

attributes.name: Screen protector adhesion type
attributes.description: Specifies the adhesive or attachment method used to affix the protector to the phone screen

attributes.name: Screen protector coverage style
attributes.description: Defines the physical coverage design or form factor of the protector relative to the device screen

attributes.name: Screen protector features
attributes.description: Highlights special functional characteristics offered by the protector beyond basic scratch prevention

attributes.name: Screen protector finish
attributes.description: Identifies the optical surface finish of the protector (e.g., glossy, matte, privacy, anti-glare)

attributes.name: Screen surface finish
attributes.description: Describes the surface treatment of the screen glass, influencing glare and feel

attributes.name: Security algorithms
attributes.description: Specifies the encryption methods used by electronics, e.g. AES

attributes.name: Selfie stick functionality type
attributes.description: Defines the primary functional configuration of the product (e.g., stick-only, stick-tripod combo, gimbal).

attributes.name: Semiconductor material
attributes.description: Identifies the base semiconductor substrate material used in the component, affecting switching speed, breakdown voltage, and thermal behavior

attributes.name: Side panel style
attributes.description: Describes the style or material of the primary side panel (e.g., tempered-glass window, mesh, solid steel)

attributes.name: Signal path technology
attributes.description: Identifies the core circuit topology (e.g., tube, solid-state, hybrid) that shapes the channel strip's sound character

attributes.name: Signal technology
attributes.description: Identifies the primary wireless or data technology the product is designed to amplify or extend

attributes.name: Signal types blocked
attributes.description: Lists the specific wireless or electromagnetic signals the product is engineered to block or shield

attributes.name: Skate shape
attributes.description: Describes the physical form factor of the skates supplied in the package

attributes.name: Sleeving style
attributes.description: Classifies the construction or structural design of the sleeve (e.g., braided, spiral, heat-shrink)

attributes.name: Smart TV platform
attributes.description: Defines the software platform used by a smart television, such as Android or Roku TV

attributes.name: Smart glasses features
attributes.description: Lists prominent built-in capabilities (e.g., AR display, touch controls, bone-conduction audio)

attributes.name: Sonar imaging modes
attributes.description: Identifies the sonar view technologies the fish finder supports

attributes.name: Speaker design
attributes.description: Defines the physical and functional design of speakers, such as subwoofer or tower

attributes.name: Speaker enclosure type
attributes.description: Describes the acoustic enclosure principle used by the speaker cabinet

attributes.name: Speaker position in laptop
attributes.description: Indicates where the speaker assembly installs within the laptop

attributes.name: Speaker technology
attributes.description: Defines the technology used in the speaker's design, e.g. dynamic, electrostatic

attributes.name: Splitter use
attributes.description: Specifies the connection types a splitter supports, such as HDMI or ethernet

attributes.name: Splitter/Switch features
attributes.description: Describes the capabilities of audio/video splitters or switches, like 3D support or audio extraction

attributes.name: Stack configuration
attributes.description: Specifies the layout of fuel cells in power devices, e.g. serial, parallel

attributes.name: Stopband
attributes.description: Specifies the range of frequencies that an electronic filter attenuates or reduces, e.g. high frequency

attributes.name: Storage drive interface type
attributes.description: Specifies the connection type of storage devices, e.g. SATA, NVMe

attributes.name: Storage drive interfaces supported
attributes.description: Identifies the compatible storage drive interfaces, like SATA or NVMe

attributes.name: Storage drive type installed
attributes.description: Identifies the storage technology, typically in network storage systems; e.g hard disk drive (HDD)

attributes.name: Storage media type
attributes.description: Identifies the type of storage media that a hard drive dock can accommodate, e.g. SATA, HDD

attributes.name: Storage types supported
attributes.description: Defines compatible storage systems for electronics, e.g. Hard disk drive (HDD)

attributes.name: Strap wearing style
attributes.description: Identifies how the strap is intended to be worn or carried

attributes.name: Stylus holder type
attributes.description: Indicates whether the case provides storage for a stylus and what form that storage takes

attributes.name: Stylus support
attributes.description: Indicates whether the e-reader supports a digital stylus for note-taking and whether one is included

attributes.name: Stylus support type
attributes.description: Describes whether and how the tablet supports input styli (e.g., active digitizer, passive capacitive)

attributes.name: Stylus technology
attributes.description: Defines the underlying technology or power method used by the stylus

attributes.name: Stylus type
attributes.description: Specifies the shape of the needle on turntable accessories, such as conical or elliptical

attributes.name: Subscription type
attributes.description: Specifies the type of subscription, typically for mobile devices; e.g. pay as you go, pre-paid

attributes.name: Subsonic filter
attributes.description: Specifies whether the unit includes a subsonic or warp filter to remove low-frequency rumble caused by record warps

attributes.name: Subwoofer configuration
attributes.description: Indicates whether a subwoofer is included and if it is built-in, wired, or wireless

attributes.name: Suitable for angling type
attributes.description: Specifies the type of fishing the product is designed for, such as deep sea or fly

attributes.name: Suitable for printer type
attributes.description: Specifies the type of printer the product is compatible with, e.g. label printer, fax machine

attributes.name: Supported DVI link type
attributes.description: States whether the device handles single-link, dual-link, or both DVI signal standards

attributes.name: Supported RAID levels
attributes.description: Lists the disk array configurations the integrated storage controller can utilize

attributes.name: Supported SDI standards
attributes.description: Indicates the SDI data rates/standards (SD-SDI, HD-SDI, 3G-SDI, etc.) the device supports for signal transmission

attributes.name: Supported USB device types
attributes.description: Specifies the kinds of USB storage devices the duplicator can handle

attributes.name: Supported audio sources
attributes.description: Lists the playback or input sources the unit can handle

attributes.name: Supported display technologies
attributes.description: Lists the types of displays or screen technologies the calibrator can profile or measure

attributes.name: Supported erase modes
attributes.description: Lists the secure-erase standards a duplicator can perform on target drives

attributes.name: Supported input types
attributes.description: Lists the kinds of audio inputs the channel strip accepts (e.g., Mic, Line, Instrument Hi-Z)

attributes.name: Supported media sources
attributes.description: Defines the physical or digital media inputs from which the unit can play music

attributes.name: Supported scan media type
attributes.description: Lists the kinds of originals the scanner can handle (e.g., various film types, reflective prints)

attributes.name: Surface sides
attributes.description: Indicates whether the print bed can be used on one or both sides

attributes.name: Switch management type
attributes.description: Classifies the level or style of management and configuration the switch supports (e.g., unmanaged, smart, web-managed, fully managed)

attributes.name: Switch mechanism
attributes.description: Identifies the internal actuation technology of the button (e.g., microswitch, optical), which impacts feel, lifespan, and responsiveness

attributes.name: Switch stem compatibility
attributes.description: Identifies the mechanical or other switch-stem styles that the keycap or key set fits

attributes.name: Switching layer
attributes.description: Indicates the highest OSI layer at which the switch natively operates (e.g., Layer 2, Layer 3, hybrids)

attributes.name: Switching method
attributes.description: Defines the method used to switch between different inputs in electronic products; e.g. remote control

attributes.name: System components included
attributes.description: Lists the key hardware pieces shipped with the system so shoppers understand what is or isn't part of the bundle

attributes.name: System/Power cable connector type (end A)
attributes.description: Identifies the exact connector standard present on the first end of the cable (e.g., IEC C14, NEMA 5-15P, USB-C)

attributes.name: System/Power cable connector type (end B)
attributes.description: Identifies the exact connector standard present on the second end of the cable (e.g., IEC C13, DC 5.5  2.1 mm, banana plug)

attributes.name: TV broadcast standards supported
attributes.description: Lists the specific television broadcast or cable/satellite standards the card or adapter can decode or receive

attributes.name: Tablet case functional features
attributes.description: Highlights key functional add-ons included with the tablet case

attributes.name: Tape cartridge format
attributes.description: Specifies the tape cartridge technologies (e.g., LTO, DAT, DLT) that the drive can read or write

attributes.name: Tape cartridge generation
attributes.description: Indicates the specific generation or version within a tape technology family (most commonly LTO generations) that the drive supports

attributes.name: Tape speed supported
